description.narrative: The overall objective of the EU support is to contribute to the implementation of the Skill Development Policy of the government in order to increase the quality and relevance of provision and the number of certified skilled labour in various sectors of employment. The purpose of the EU support is to increase the capacity of the Directorate General for Employment and Training (DGE&T), the National Council for Vocational Training (NCVT), and the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC).

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to India

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to India

title.narrative: Extent to which Labour Market Information Systems (LMIS) and Labour Market Analysis (LMA) practices at national level, and in the State of Uttar Pradesh on a pilot basis, were enhanced

description.narrative: Extent to which Labour Market Information Systems (LMIS) and Labour Market Analysis (LMA) practices at national level, and in the State of Uttar Pradesh on a pilot basis, were enhanced

title.narrative: Extent to which Labour Market Information Systems (LMIS) and Labour Market Analysis (LMA) practices at national level, and in the State of Uttar Pradesh on a pilot basis, were enhanced

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Currrent LMI and LMA systems are not functional

comment.narrative: Currrent LMI and LMA systems are not functional

target.value: LMIS developed and LMA practices improved at national level, and state level on a pilot basis

comment.narrative: LMIS developed and LMA practices improved at national level, and state level on a pilot basis

actual.value: LMIS and LMA practices at national level enhanced and piloted in Uttar Pradesh

title.narrative: Extent to which a National Qualification Framework (NQF) for India was developed and maintained

description.narrative: Extent to which a National Qualification Framework (NQF) for India was developed and maintained

title.narrative: Extent to which a National Qualification Framework (NQF) for India was developed and maintained

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: The government of India does not have a NQF but intends to develop one

comment.narrative: The government of India does not have a NQF but intends to develop one

target.value: Substantial progress made in the development and maintenance of a national qualification framework for India, including national occupational coding

comment.narrative: Substantial progress made in the development and maintenance of a national qualification framework for India, including national occupational coding

actual.value: Substantial progress made in the development and maintenance of NSQF for India, including national occupational coding

title.narrative: Extent to which the capacity of the National Skill Development Agency (NSDA) and selected State Skill Development Missions (SSDMs) to apply and adopt, as and where relevant, a European best practice perspective on skills development was increased

title.narrative: Extent to which the capacity of the National Skill Development Agency (NSDA) and selected State Skill Development Missions (SSDMs) to apply and adopt, as and where relevant, a European best practice perspective on skills development was increased

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Insufficient capacity of NDSA and of SSDMs due to a lack of knowledge of best practices on skills development

comment.narrative: Insufficient capacity of NDSA and of SSDMs due to a lack of knowledge of best practices on skills development

target.value: Capacity of NDSA and 3 SSDMs to apply and adopt best practices on skills development has increased

comment.narrative: Capacity of NDSA and 3 SSDMs to apply and adopt best practices on skills development has increased

actual.value: NDSA and SSDMs of Uttar Pradesh, Karnataka and Himachal Pradesh are now able to apply and adopt, as and where relevant, a European best practice perspective on skills development
